book_1.title: The Find
book_1.core_arc: Nico discovers the money, tries and fails to move up legitimately, begins building his shadow welfare state in Level 8

tentpoles.description: Nico's daily life as small-time Veil dealer, showing the grinding poverty and hopelessness of Level 8, ends with him being hired to clean out a dead man's apartment
Nico discovers the data core with 50 million credits, has it verified by a fence, realizes he's holding a fortune
After failed attempts to buy his way up tiers (rejected, scammed, denied), Nico makes the decision to spend the money in Level 8 instead - buys first restaurant and announces free meals
Nico's charity operation grows, he's beloved in Level 8, but attracts attention from both gangs who want a cut and authorities who investigate the money source

Commander Wright confronts Nico directly, can't prove the money's origin but warns him he's being watched. Nico realizes he's started something he can't stop, and doesn't want to. He's 'The King' now.

chapter_outline.title: Another Day in Hell
chapter_outline.summary: Nico's routine as dealer, using Veil himself, scraping by, showing Level 8's brutality. Ends with cleaning job offer.

chapter_outline.title: The Dead Man's Room
chapter_outline.summary: Cleaning the apartment, finding the hidden data core, keeping it secret from landlord.

chapter_outline.title: The Fence
chapter_outline.summary: Taking data core to black market tech fence Kade knows, learning it's worth millions.

chapter_outline.title: Fever Dreams
chapter_outline.summary: Nico high on Veil, fantasizing about escape, visiting Maya who tries intervention, rejects her help.

chapter_outline.title: Fifty Million
chapter_outline.summary: TENTPOLE - Confirmation the credits are real and accessible, Nico's overwhelmed, shares news with Kade.

chapter_outline.title: The Application
chapter_outline.summary: Nico tries to apply for Level 6 housing legitimately, first rejection due to criminal record.

chapter_outline.title: The Bribe
chapter_outline.summary: Attempts to bribe a housing official, gets scammed out of 100k credits, learns he's a mark.

chapter_outline.title: Maya's World
chapter_outline.summary: Visits Maya's Level 6 apartment, sees what he's locked out of, they argue about systemic barriers.

chapter_outline.title: Business Venture Denied
chapter_outline.summary: Tries to start 'legitimate' business, denied all permits, realizes the system is rigged.

chapter_outline.title: The Decision
chapter_outline.summary: TENTPOLE - Drunk and high, Nico buys the noodle shop he eats at, tells owner to serve free meals on Fridays. The experiment begins.

chapter_outline.title: Free Friday
chapter_outline.summary: First free meal day, lines around the block, Nico sees hunger he'd stopped noticing, feels something new.

chapter_outline.title: Expansion
chapter_outline.summary: Buys three more restaurants, a clinic, starts paying for medical care. Word spreads. Kade warns him about attention.

chapter_outline.title: The King of Eight
chapter_outline.summary: People start calling him 'Uncle Nico' and 'The King', he's uncomfortable but also intoxicated by respect.

chapter_outline.title: Complications
chapter_outline.summary: Local gang leader demands protection money from the restaurants, Nico has to learn to be ruthless.

chapter_outline.title: Authorities Notice
chapter_outline.summary: TENTPOLE - SSS investigates money source, Nico's operation at risk, he has to cover tracks while maintaining charity.

chapter_outline.title: Lin's Test
chapter_outline.summary: Lin Zhao confronts Nico, questions his motives, tests if he's exploiting people's gratitude. He passes, barely.

chapter_outline.title: Maya's Dilemma
chapter_outline.summary: Maya discovers what Nico's doing, conflicted between reporting him and recognizing the good he's doing.

chapter_outline.title: The First Betrayal
chapter_outline.summary: Someone Nico helped steals from the operation, Nico has them 'dealt with' harshly, crosses a line.

chapter_outline.title: Building the Kingdom
chapter_outline.summary: Montage of expansion - housing, schools, entertainment, Nico's becoming a shadow government.

chapter_outline.title: The Warning
chapter_outline.summary: TENTPOLE - Commander Wright confronts Nico, can't arrest but warns him. Nico defiant. Book ends with his committed to the path.

book_2.title: The Kingdom
book_2.core_arc: Nico's shadow welfare state flourishes but creates labor crisis; economic war with upper tiers; Nico becomes more ruthless; his addiction worsens

tentpoles.description: Three years later, Level 8 transformed into quasi-utopia, but upper tiers facing labor shortage crisis. Board meeting of corporate council deciding how to handle 'the Nico Chen problem'
Upper tiers cut power and water to Level 8 as punishment. Nico has to smuggle resources, his money draining fast. Realizes he's in a war.
Massive riot when SSS raids Level 8, thousands protect Nico, several killed. Nico hides, realizes his charity has created an army. He's terrified and exhilarated.
Kade overdoses badly, nearly dies. Nico confronts his own worsening addiction. Money running low. Maya begs him to stop before more people die. He refuses.
Corporate council offers the deal: wealth and citizenship for Nico if he dismantles everything. He's shown what his life could be. Cliffhanger: he has 48 hours to decide.

chapter_outline.title: The Kingdom Flourishes
chapter_outline.summary: TENTPOLE - 3 years later, showing transformed Level 8, but corporate meeting reveals labor crisis and plan to stop Nico.

chapter_outline.title: Uncle Nico's Court
chapter_outline.summary: Nico's daily routine now - people asking for help, him granting 'favors', uncomfortable parallels to feudalism.

chapter_outline.title: The Addiction Deepens
chapter_outline.summary: Nico using more Veil to handle stress, hiding it from everyone, functional addict with too much responsibility.

chapter_outline.title: Labor Shortage
chapter_outline.summary: Upper tier managers can't fill positions, waste piling up, systems failing, blaming Level 8 'laziness.'

chapter_outline.title: Propaganda War
chapter_outline.summary: Station media runs hit pieces on Nico, calling him warlord, his people welfare queens. Shaping public opinion.

chapter_outline.title: Lin's Warning
chapter_outline.summary: Lin tells Nico this can't last, they need sustainability not charity. He's defensive, not ready to hear it.

chapter_outline.title: The Cutoff
chapter_outline.summary: TENTPOLE - Upper tiers cut utilities to Level 8. Lights go out. Water stops. Calculated cruelty.

chapter_outline.title: Emergency Measures
chapter_outline.summary: Nico using black market to smuggle power cells, water, burning through credits to keep people alive.

chapter_outline.title: Maya Crosses the Line
chapter_outline.summary: Maya officially quits her job, joins Nico's operation, bridge burned with the system.

chapter_outline.title: The Council's Plan
chapter_outline.summary: Corporate council planning to raid Level 8, seize Nico's assets, restore 'order.'

chapter_outline.title: Preparing for War
chapter_outline.summary: Kade organizes defense, people of Level 8 ready to fight, Nico realizes he's created something bigger than himself.

chapter_outline.title: The Riot
chapter_outline.summary: TENTPOLE - SSS raids, thousands defend Nico, violence, deaths, Nico hides and watches his people fight for him.

chapter_outline.title: Body Count
chapter_outline.summary: Aftermath, 47 dead, hundreds injured, Nico visits injured, guilt overwhelming, uses Veil heavily.

chapter_outline.title: The Fugitive King
chapter_outline.summary: Nico can't appear publicly now, living in hiding, paranoia growing, still running operation remotely.

chapter_outline.title: Kade's Spiral
chapter_outline.summary: Kade haunted by violence, using more, Nico too preoccupied to notice his friend is dying.

chapter_outline.title: Overdose
chapter_outline.summary: TENTPOLE - Kade found unresponsive, Nico gets him to clinic, confronts his own addiction watching Kade barely survive.

chapter_outline.title: The Money's Running Out
chapter_outline.summary: Accountant tells Nico he has maybe 2 years left at current burn rate, needs new plan.

chapter_outline.title: Wright's Conscience
chapter_outline.summary: Commander Wright POV, seeing casualties, questioning orders, but still following them.

chapter_outline.title: The Offer
chapter_outline.summary: Corporate envoy secretly contacts Nico with the deal, shows him what he could have.

chapter_outline.title: Forty-Eight Hours
chapter_outline.summary: TENTPOLE - Nico has two days to decide: betray Level 8 and gain everything, or refuse and lose everything. Book ends with him staring at the deal.

book_3.title: The Fall
book_3.core_arc: Nico refuses the deal, faces final confrontation with authorities, uses last resources to help people organize themselves, dies in prison but leaves a legacy

tentpoles.description: Nico rejects the deal, immediately faces consequences - assets frozen, warrant issued. He has weeks of freedom left.
With Lin and Maya's help, Nico pivots strategy - using remaining funds to seed worker cooperatives and unions, teaching people to sustain themselves
The cooperatives work. People starting to organize across levels, not just Level 8. Station-wide labor movement beginning. Upper tiers terrified.
Kade sacrifices himself to buy Nico time, dying in shootout with SSS. Nico devastated but can't stop now.
Nico dies in prison at 47, but epilogue shows station transformed by labor movement he sparked. Complex, messy legacy. Some call him hero, some villain, truth is both.

chapter_outline.title: The Refusal
chapter_outline.summary: TENTPOLE - Nico tells corporate envoy no, accepts consequences, knows he's a dead man walking.

chapter_outline.title: Assets Frozen
chapter_outline.summary: Authorities move fast, seize his financial accounts, he has only hidden physical resources left.

chapter_outline.title: The Warrant
chapter_outline.summary: Arrest warrant issued, SSS hunting him, Level 8 hiding him, moving safe house to safe house.

chapter_outline.title: Maya's Determination
chapter_outline.summary: Maya fully committed now, helps Nico move resources, their relationship deepens in crisis.

chapter_outline.title: Lin's Wisdom
chapter_outline.summary: Lin tells Nico charity was always temporary, real change is teaching people to organize themselves.

chapter_outline.title: The New Plan
chapter_outline.summary: TENTPOLE - Nico uses remaining money to seed worker cooperatives, collective ownership, unions. Building infrastructure for after he's gone.

chapter_outline.title: Teaching Resistance
chapter_outline.summary: Secret meetings teaching people organizing, collective bargaining, mutual aid without a benefactor.

chapter_outline.title: Health Failing
chapter_outline.summary: Years of Veil use catching up, Nico's body breaking down, no time for treatment.

chapter_outline.title: Spread of the Movement
chapter_outline.summary: Workers in Level 7, then Level 6 start organizing, inspired by Level 8's example.

chapter_outline.title: Corporate Panic
chapter_outline.summary: Council realizes they're facing system-wide labor revolt, not just one troublemaker.

chapter_outline.title: Wright's Crisis
chapter_outline.summary: Commander Wright ordered to crack down harder, beginning to question if he's on the right side.

chapter_outline.title: The Strike
chapter_outline.summary: TENTPOLE - Station-wide general strike, thousands of workers walk out, station functions grinding to halt.

chapter_outline.title: Negotiations
chapter_outline.summary: Corporate council forced to negotiate with worker representatives, first time in station history.

chapter_outline.title: The Betrayal Within
chapter_outline.summary: Someone in Nico's inner circle sells him out for reward money, SSS knows his location.

chapter_outline.title: The Raid Coming
chapter_outline.summary: Kade learns of incoming raid, plans to hold them off while Nico escapes.

chapter_outline.title: Kade's Last Stand
chapter_outline.summary: TENTPOLE - Kade dies in shootout buying Nico time to escape, final act of redemption.

chapter_outline.title: Grief and Rage
chapter_outline.summary: Nico mourning Kade, nearly gives up, Maya and Lin keep him moving forward.

chapter_outline.title: The Final Transfer
chapter_outline.summary: Nico transferring all remaining resources to cooperative network, making himself unnecessary.

chapter_outline.title: Capture
chapter_outline.summary: SSS finally corners Nico, he surrenders peacefully to avoid bloodshed, arrested publicly.

chapter_outline.title: Legacy
chapter_outline.summary: TENTPOLE - Nico's trial, prison time, death at 47 from organ failure. Epilogue: 5 years later, station changed, labor has power, Nico's District exists, his statue in a park. Lin tells his story to young activists. Complicated legacy - he was a drug dealer, a thief, a would-be king, and a spark that lit a fire.

trilogy_themes: Individual charity cannot solve systemic oppression - requires collective action
Power corrupts but powerlessness corrupts absolutely
The difference between a hero and a villain is often just perspective
Addiction doesn't disqualify someone from being worthy or capable of good
Systems are designed to maintain themselves - change requires breaking them

planted_elements_across_trilogy.payoff: Book 3, Chapter 17 - Maya asks if he wants to contact them before he's arrested, he says they're not his family anymore
planted_elements_across_trilogy.significance: Shows Nico found real family in Level 8 community

planted_elements_across_trilogy.payoff: Book 3, Chapter 11 - Wright finally admits he's from Level 7, understands the pain he's inflicting
planted_elements_across_trilogy.significance: Humanizes the antagonist, shows systemic tragedy

planted_elements_across_trilogy.element: The original owner of the money
planted_elements_across_trilogy.payoff: Book 2, Chapter 19 - Revealed the dead man was corporate accountant who planned to expose embezzlement, killed for it
planted_elements_across_trilogy.significance: Nico is using stolen money that was itself stolen from workers

planted_elements_across_trilogy.payoff: Book 3, Chapter 17 - They finally admit they loved each other, too late for normal life together
planted_elements_across_trilogy.significance: Personal tragedy mirrors larger systemic tragedy

planted_elements_across_trilogy.payoff: Book 2, Chapter 12 - He treats dozens of injured rioters, Book 3, Chapter 16 - Dies using those skills to save others
planted_elements_across_trilogy.significance: Even the broken can be healers
